meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Lamb Tom Gray Beth Phillips Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #720.

td.p: John Lamb, a savings and loan executive originally from New York
Tom Gray, a journalist from Van Nuys, California
Beth Phillips, a photographer from Santa Fe, New Mexico (whose 2-day cash winnings total $7,500)

tr.td: U.S. STATES
BIRD SONGS
TV TRIVIA
THE HUMAN BODY
AMY VENDERBILT SAYS

div.onmouseout:

"Hello world, here\'s a song that we\'re singin\' /
Come on, get happy /
A whole lotta lovin\' is what we\'ll be bringin\' /
We\'ll make you happy..."')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
He sang the lead on the following TV theme & co-starred on the series with his stepmother:
"Hello world, here's a song that we're singin' /
Come on, get happy /
A whole lotta lovin' is what we'll be bringin' /
We'll make you happy..."
